episodes.synopsis: Leading a team of mid-level criminals and a corrupt solicitor, Bruce Reynolds pulls off a major theft that baffled the police but thrilled the public.
episodes.title: A Robber's Tale

episodes.synopsis: Tommy Butler leads an elite team of brilliant, idiosyncratic investigators, all of whom have very different methods and opinions.
episodes.title: A Copper's Tale

video.title: The Great Train Robbery
video.synopsis: From the acclaimed writer of the hit series Broadchurch come two ninety-minute films chronicling the true story of the 1963 Great Train Robbery. On 8 August, 1963 Britain awakens to the news of the biggest robbery in the country's history.
